name: Rudraksh Club & Resort
address: 4QGV, + 7VC, Ujjain - Indore Rd, near Navgraha Mandir Triveni Sangam, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
We stayed here just for one night, mainly to sleep after a long day. Unfortunately, the central AC wasn’t working properly, and by 2 AM it had completely stopped. Even before that, the cooling was poor. We had to call and complain to get it fixed, which disrupted our rest.

What made things worse was the attitude of the staff. At checkout, no one acknowledged our inconvenience. The manager had no idea about the issue, and the front desk staff were indifferent—as if handling complaints with silence is part of their daily routine. Not even a basic apology was offered.

We checked in late (around 10 PM) and left after breakfast. All we wanted was a peaceful night’s sleep, but even that wasn’t delivered. Definitely not the experience you expect from a resort of this standard.

I am writing to express my deep disappointment with my recent experience at this property (Rudraksh Resort Ujjain). Unfortunately, my stay was far from the standard one would expect from a hospitality establishment, especially one charging premium rates.

My experience began at the reception, where I arrived at approximately 10:30 PM, hoping to find a reasonable deal for a short stay—less than 12 hours, as I planned to check out the next morning. However, I was informed that the entire resort was sold out and that even if rooms were available, they would be charged at a non-negotiable rate of ₹8,000. I was also told that staff had been instructed to sell rooms at escalated prices. I found the tone and manner in which this was communicated quite unwelcoming and lacking the courtesy expected in the hospitality industry.

Subsequently, I booked a room online through Cleartrip for ₹6,500—a Superior Room. Upon returning to the property, I was told the room I booked was not available and that I had been "upgraded" to a Superior Deluxe Room. While I initially appreciated the gesture, the upgraded room was in a poor and unacceptable condition—unclean and poorly maintained. I immediately requested to be placed in the room I originally booked.

Eventually, I was allotted the original category, but the room did not match the images shown online. It lacked basic amenities like bedside lamps and looked significantly different from the photos, which I was told "may be outdated." It was clear to me, however, that the pictures online were recent and more flattering than the reality.

I raised the issue again with a senior staff member, who then offered another upgrade to an Executive Room. By this time, it was around 11:15 PM, and I was extremely fatigued from the entire ordeal. The Executive Room, too, was disappointing. It appeared old and worn-out—the furniture was stained and had hair from a previous guest, the toilet was not properly cleaned, and overall cleanliness and quality of the room were far below acceptable standards. I have photographic evidence to support these claims.

Given the premium pricing, I strongly believe that basic standards of hygiene, maintenance, and service should be upheld. Unfortunately, that was not the case.

Later that night, I visited their cafe, which I was informed operates until 2:00 AM. I ordered Hakka noodles and a classic veg pizza. The noodles were average, but the pizza—after a 20-minute wait—was served with an overwhelming amount of mozzarella cheese, making it inedible. When I requested to cancel the pizza, I was told it could not be canceled and could only be remade. At that point, given everything that had already transpired, I had no desire to wait another 20 minutes. After a prolonged and frustrating conversation involving multiple staff members, the item was eventually canceled.

Overall, this was one of the worst hospitality experiences I have encountered. The quality of the rooms, lack of cleanliness, and dismissive customer service are not reflective of the standards expected from a resort of your repute. I would not recommend this property to others unless significant improvements are made in both quality and service delivery.

Extremely poor service. There is a certain amount of arrogance without providing any quality service. I wonder why they call this a five star hotel. There is no covered parking and no even an iota of shade available.

Food are over fairly priced compared to the quality they provide.

Really not happy staying here. Would suggest checking the alternate which is 2 km far from this with much better facility and food choices.

name: Hotel Abika Elite
address: 4 2, Nazar Ali Marg, Nijatpura, Malipura, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text:
The hotel stay was good overall. The staff behavior was excellent, and the taste of food was amazing, especially the breakfast, which had a wide variety of tasty options. The outdoor area was well-maintained and clean.

However, the rooms need some repairs, particularly on the flooring and in the washrooms, which could improve the overall comfort.

The stay felt a little expensive, but considering the service and food quality, it was satisfactory.

The location is close to the major temples. The rooms are quite spacious and clean as well. The quality of food and variety is great, excellent service by the staff (all of them - reception, restaurant and housekeeping) especially the housekeeping support by Mukesh.

We stayed for two nights. Good reception staff
Housekeeping was pretty decent.
We used the hotel taxi and our driver Mahesh was excellent.
We ate at the restaurant Lotus, the food was good and staff attentive and friendly. A special mention to Karuna who looked after us really well.
The rooms are a little tired and the linen was not the cleanest but overall was good enough.

name: Solitaire Hotel & Resort
address: Chintaman Road, Jaysinghpura, near Jantar Mantar, infront of Gyan Sagar Girls Academy, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text:
I had a very disappointing experience at this hotel.
The building is very old and poorly maintained.
The washrooms were not clean at all, which was extremely unhygienic.
There were a lot of mosquitoes in the room, which made it impossible to sleep.
Insects were crawling around the room, including near the bed.
The air conditioner in my room was not working properly.
Despite informing the staff, they did not take any action to fix it.
The landline phone in the room was also not functional.
I had no way to contact reception without going all the way downstairs.
This was very inconvenient during the night.
The biggest issue was the noise from the neighboring rooms.
Guests in the adjacent room were making noise all day and night.
There was loud music, shouting, and banging on the walls.
Hotel management did nothing to control the disturbance.
I complained multiple times but they ignored it.
It felt like the hotel had no rules or supervision.
I couldn’t sleep properly even for a single night.
This completely ruined my trip.
The overall cleanliness of the hotel was very poor.
Dust and stains were visible in many corners.
Even the bedsheets didn’t look freshly washed.
There was a constant bad smell in the room.
This hotel is not worth the money charged.
I would strongly advise against staying here.
Definitely not recommended for a peaceful or hygienic stay.

Private part hard DJ even at 10:30 pm will not let you sleep . If you are booking to sleep and visit temple fresh next morning don’t book . No support even after requesting to slow down music or reduce bass

Rooms Are good. But not Maintained,  even staff is rude  with behavior  no proper answer  / Restaurant  orders Are served  in a. Hour  [completely  worst]  , room Are not even hygiene  , mosquito/ spiders are found in bed  foul smell in room  , and no proper answer from reception  , or  staff

name: BARODA HOUSE STAY UJJAIN
address: house no, Laxmanpuri, 38, nanakheda rode, New Indra Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: It was quite accommodating and the environment of the place was quite family oriented. I really liked the host, he was polite and friendly and quite helpful to us. And the place was budget friendly to us. Will recommend everyone who is visiting Ujjain.

I recommend to stay at this place with all my heart. I like the nature of the person Mr.Bhatnagar, He is so polite,friendly nature and respectful person. He treat us like a family and take care of every thing.
The room is good & clean. Parking for 2 wheeler is available. Overall great experience. Bhatnagar ji (owner) is a very humble & cooperative person. Highly recommended if you are visiting Ujjain!

name: Gaurison Hotel&Resort
address: Gram Sanwara Khedi, Sanwara Khedi Simhastha Bypass Road, New RTO Road, near by Ashtvinayak Temple, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with a recent hotel booking made through your platform Gaurison Hotel and Resort, Ujjain. This is Dharmshala and not resort.

The hotel was advertised as a 4-star property, but the reality was far from it like Dharmshala. The condition of the hotel was extremely poor—more comparable to a 1-star establishment. The rooms were inadequately maintained, unhygienic, and had a persistent foul smell. Basic amenities were missing:
No room service or in-house restaurant
No refrigerator in the room or anywhere on the property
No complimentary drinking water provided
The swimming pool was dirty.
The parking facility was inconveniently located 1 km away from the hotel
Additionally, the washrooms were unclean and the premises lacked regular housekeeping.
This experience was extremely disappointing and not aligned with what was promised at the time of booking.
Comfortable & spacious & well cleaned rooms. Staff's behavior is polite. However kitchen is not working during my stay. Otherwise all is good.

I visited this property on 16th April and had a terrible experience. We booked two rooms — one room's door wouldn't open and the washroom jet wasn't working. We paid ₹2700 for that room. In the morning, someone brought tea and sandwiches we never ordered. When we refused to pay for it during checkout, the front desk guy misbehaved and threatened us. He even spoke rudely to my husband and me. They just add extra charges to increase the bill. This place looks nothing like the pictures. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to stay here. Worst experience

name: Hotel Shriram Ujjain
address: Malipura Road, Near Bus & Railway Station, Dewas Gate, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text:
A Wonderful Stay at Hotel Shree Ram (Ujjain)

I recently stayed at Hotel Shree Ram (Ujjain)and had an exceptional experience. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and made me feel right at home. The check-in process was smooth, and they even offered me a complimentary drink upon arrival.

The room was spacious, modern, and immaculately clean. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the view from my window was breathtaking. The bathroom had high-quality amenities.

One of the highlights of my stay was the on-site restaurant. The food was delicious, with a great variety of options for all tastes.

The hotel’s location is perfect, with easy access to nearby attractions and public transport.

Overall, I had a fantastic stay at Hotel Shree Ram and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area. I’ll definitely be back for my next trip!

Excellent service within walking distance from the railway station. The staff is well-trained and highly supportive. Room service, air conditioning, water heater, and especially power backup are all up to the mark. Restaurant at 1st floor is superb pure home like quality food. Shree Ram Sir is always available for assistance. Hotel feel like Home 😊
Good service, room and good ambience in the location near railway station. The food was very tasty. Overall great experience visiting Ujjain.

name: Mansarovar Guest House Near Mahakal Temple Ujjain
address: 31 Kaharwadi Ramghat Road Infront of Kumrawat Dham Dharamshala, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: Bad experience..My husband forgot his belt and shorts in the hotel room. Despite repeated reminders, the staff did not return our belongings

Worst experience, rediciulous behaviour, dark and dirty rooms,no facility at all.. bathroom are very small and very dirty...
Highly disappointed..
Very nice staff and very clean room and the food is amazing

name: HOTEL MIDLAND
address: 6/1, Ram Ji Gali, near Shri Dwarkadhish Gopal Mandir Ujjain, Kamri Marg, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text: Very bad experience with this hotel . We booked 5 rooms for 2 nights . When we reached there and checked in. Then we saw cockroaches were in the room and toilet. Rooms and toilets were dirty. A bad smell was there in the toilet and so dirty that one can start vomiting. In breakfast they only provided the poha and kachori daily. I have stayed in many hotels and this one is the worst ever. Even we have booked this hotel online one month before checked in date , but still we had to wait for many hours. Really ,really bad experience. I would recommend not to book this hotel . Definitely you would regret it.

According to the price of the hotel rooms are good. Staff is available at any time and service is very good and fast also. For breakfast they serve poha, dhokla and kachori. The taste was awesome.main two points are:- The hotel is near mahakal mandir so we enjoyed the corridor area in the temple with tension free mood and for dinner there had a punjabi restaurant near this hotel which is available for late night and for tasty food.
Overall the hotel is good for 1,2 days stays.

Room are not good as all furniture is not maintained. Found Mice 🐁 in ground floor rooms. Than manager has changed our room. Cleaning is bed,  improvement a lot. Staff is good and cooperative.
Location is inside the narrow lane only auto can enter.  Hotel offer pickup from Ujjain Railway station

name: Shree Ganga SMB Hotel & Resorts Pvt. Ltd.
address: 50 Ramkrishna colony, dushera maidan, Dewas Rd, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: As per price range they will not provide Complimentry breakfast. Some of staff on reception and restaurant not able to understand Complimentry breakfast. I ask thrice on reception and restaurant they will say yes for room stay person food is Complimentry. After finish the food they give me bill. I completely 👎😡.

Quality, ambience, and atmosphere, all 10/10.
I regularly stop by just to grab their sev and snacks, it’s become a weekly habit now. The place has a comforting vibe, and everything I’ve tried so far has been fresh and flavorful. Highly recommend it if you’re into good snacks and a chill atmosphere.

It use to be a good place for dinning, but with expansion services are getting degraded day by day. Staff in restaurant is very rude especially in new Dussashara maidan shop. Response time is very long staff does not listen to costumers and if listen answers very rudely. Restaurant service staff needs behaviour  training.

name: MPT Avantika, Ujjain
address: Bus Stop, near Nanakheda, Nanakheda, Rishi Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
I checked into the hotel on the 19th. I had to visit Mahakal and Omkareshwar, so I left my luggage at the reception and informed the manager that I would return at night. I specifically requested that my room be made ready by then and that my luggage be placed in the room, so that everything would be in order when I returned and there would be no inconvenience.

When I came back at 12:15 AM, only one room was ready, and the second AC deluxe room was neither ready nor did anyone seem aware of it. The night staff said that the morning staff didn’t inform them, and in the morning, when I brought it up, I was told that the night staff should have handled it.

Secondly, there was no tea/coffee maker in the room, even though it was mentioned as a facility in the AC deluxe room. The price difference between the two rooms was quite significant, but both rooms looked the same from the inside—so what was the benefit of paying more?

In the kitchen, there was only one staff member cooking and one steward delivering the food. The service was extremely slow. This place needs a lot of improvement so that such a beautiful property, located at such a prime location, can be utilized to its full potential.

It seems that because this is a government property, the staff is not paying proper attention to service and maintenance.

Infrastructure is good. Though it is old architect but really attractive. Need to improve some repairing work related to AC standards room:  the front door, kitchen ( cooler tap) , In reception area the switch and fan regulator, sofa or chair cover , need repairs AC or replaced.
Location is So nice and peaceful outside the main city area.
Food is awesome, nice quality if you want to replace some crockery than good otherwise okay.
Delux room is spacious.
Improve AC standards.
Prices is affordable and low compared to others.
Otherwise everything fine nice stay for me.
Your manager is so nice and very cooperative. Durgeswariji is very nice person. She upgraded my room from AC standards to Deluxe.
Kitchen staff is also good.

Property is good and specious near market area  however badly maintained.
Only fixed 2-3 items available in breakfast lunch or in dinner. Need to improve in food options and need some renovation work..
Food taste is good.. but very limited options available.
AC Deluxe room are good and specious.

name: Hotel Atharva
address: Mahakal, Harsiddhi bypass road, near Jantar Mantar, Jaisinghpura, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
A Perfect Blend of Comfort, Luxury & Ambiance!

I had a wonderful experience at Atharva Hotel & Resort. The property is beautifully designed with a modern touch and lush green surroundings. The evening lighting gives it a warm and luxurious vibe that stands out the moment you arrive.

The entrance is grand, and the landscaping with palm trees and well-maintained gardens adds to the resort-like feel. Inside, the ambiance is equally impressive—calm, clean, and welcoming.

Modak Restaurant, located within the premises, offers delicious meals with great service. The staff is courteous and attentive, making sure every guest feels taken care of.

Overall, Atharva is a fantastic place to stay or host events. Highly recommended for both business and leisure travelers! 🌴✨

I booked this place based on 4 star rating on Google. This place had several issues 1) No running hot water - when I complained, they brought it with a bucket 2) Cockroaches on the floor 3) some other bugs on the bathroom walls 4) One of the lift was not working on the first day, it later worked 5) The towel, blankets etc are yellowish. DON'T GO.

“Our stay at Hotel Atharva was truly exceptional! The manager Mr Hatimtai was incredibly generous and hospitable, going above and beyond to ensure our comfort. His kindness and willingness to help in every possible way. Such dedication and warmth made our experience unforgettable. Highly recommended!”

name: MPT Shipra Residency, Ujjain
address: University Road, Teen Batti Chauraha, near Madhav Club Road, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: The accommodations were comfortable, and the spacious rooms were a haven after a long day. However, what truly made my stay special was the exceptional staff. They were polite, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met. A special shoutout to Sakshi, who was an absolute delight! She's an amazing listener and problem-solver, making sure every issue was resolved with a smile. Five stars isn't enough – I'd give it ten stars if I could! Highly recommend this hotel for its warm hospitality and excellent service.

From perspective of govt. run hotel, experience was unexpectedly good. Location is convenient.
Breakfast reviews were average but we found food was good in taste. Don’t expect much continental options.
Rooms were spacious, bed was clean, AC was perfectly working, bathroom was big and clean.

Good location and great facility. It was our first time in Ujjain. We were lucky to find this location. The room was clean, front desk was helpful. We were specifically impressed by the restaurant. We were planning of having only breakfast there but after trying their breakfast, we ate all three meals there for 2 days. In the restaurant, the staff was able to prepare things to our liking and modify few things as per our instructions. Also, they kept out 3 years old kid entertained. Thank you MPT Shipra residency staff.

name: Hotel Shree krishna palace
address: 97, Danigate, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text: Not worth staying here as he charge 2000/- per night and comparitively rooms are not maintained properly. He is having 3 bed room means 3 people (thin) can sleep on one bed. If your height is 5'.8" then your legs will go out of bed. There is no dust bin in room.  TV is just for name sake, its not working. When i asked for remote then he said use mobile phone. I had to changed the room due to heavy water leakage in bathroom.  These rooms are not worth more than Rs. 1000/- per night.

It was a very nice and comfortable stay. Rooms and bathroom are so clean and spacious. Facilities and service are all excellent and money taken was definetely worth it. Owner are staff are so nice helpful and copretive.
Ansh sir is so nice and helpful
Location is too near to temple and has private indoor parking.
Thank you

Hotel property is so nice.
And we take there package system facility
So they provided us every thing great and at very low cost
And near by temple

name: HOTEL CRYSTAL INN UJJAIN
address: Bus Stand, 4, Kirti Nagar, Ujjain - Indore Rd, near Nanakheda, near Lal Gate, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text:
Had a pleasant stay at this hotel in Ujjain. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-maintained. The staff was courteous and responsive, making the experience comfortable. The location is convenient for visiting key attractions like Mahakaleshwar Temple.

A few minor improvements could be made in terms of food options and room service speed, but overall, it’s a good choice for a comfortable stay in Ujjain. Would recommend it for travelers looking for a decent stay at a reasonable price.

Food is available at room ,but they bring them outside restaurants.its only negative point.
Nice service. Clean room best location

Very poor hotel and very poor and uneducated staff
Room was booked on phone and payment was done
If you have a complaint the phone was unavailable
The staff said they are not responsible talk to owner
Rude and abusive staff
Kitchen is not there
Tasteless outside food

name: HOTEL GLOBAL UJJAIN
address: 8, Ravi Shankar Nagar, Suraj Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: The hotel owner manages everything efficiently, ensuring good hospitality. The rooms are of excellent quality, and the hotel is conveniently located near the temple, making it suitable for everyone. It is also economical. Although there is an issue with parking, the staff takes proper care of the vehicles, so there’s no need to worry. Thank you!

Had a wonderful stay at this hotel located near Mahakal Lok! The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was courteous, and the service was excellent. Perfect location for visiting the temple. Highly recommended for a peaceful and convenient stay.

We stay here with our family, Hotel is near by station and temple also. Owner and other staffs are also very helpful, service also good and if we ask them for extra service if any then they help us with no tantrums, ensuring good hospitality, room was very comfortable neat & clean, washroom and had all the facilities which a family would need, Would love to book rooms again whenever we visit Ujjain again...🌟🌟🌟🌟

name: President Hotel
address: New Hariphatak Over Bridge, Indore Rd, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
Highly disappointed with the hotel service.i checked in on 24 jun 2025 for a day , power use to cut off 2-3 time for more than 5 min each time, as I have a year old baby with me it makes me very inconvenient.even tap got out of water in morning,even more than 5-6 complaint nothing happened check out at 12 pm still no water in room.
room no.- 206
Same problem with other room in our row.
We had to check out at 9 am but my tour got spoiled because of water issue in this hotel.

Very good hotels. Best location rooms are very big and manage everything perfectly well. People r very comfortable cooperative. Car parking space also available. Now days restaurants not working. So breakfast lunch dinner need to order out side

It's a very horrible hotel,there was no water in the morning. When I called at the reception,Mr Sumit was very rude and said he can't do anything about it.
The service is not like what it used to be couple of years ago,pathetic and totally unacceptable.

name: Hotel Park Palace
address: 5Q6G+HPH Avanti Hospital Hariphatak, Near, Mahakal Ring Road, Nanakheda, Shivalay Twp, Ujjain, Sawara Khedi, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: Budget hotel. Good service. Improvement in room quality required. Problem with TV, a/c remote, room electric kettle, bathroom exhaust fan. Other than these minor problems, it was an excellent stay. Checked in at 5:30 am in the morning and staff was there for our pre-booked room. Overall a good stay. Far better than hotels in front of Mahakaleshwar mandir.
Had a great stay , we left one of our phone and was promptly searched and fiven to us safely . GREAT STAFF THANKU
Stayed at the hotel’s room during my friend’s wedding. The rooms were in good condition and spacious. The bathroom was also clean.

name: HOTEL IN UJJAIN
address: 86 Hotel in ujjain vivekanand colony ujjain, near railway station platform no 8., 1.5 Km to mahakal entrance. Hotel in ujjain, Hotel in ujjain, ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: The hotel is top-notch by its price and cleanliness. The owner is friendly and cooperative. Best hotel to stay under 700/-Rs. Nowadays, with this much money it's hard to find better hotels. 10-11 JAN 25.
Best service & rooms are so good staff so friendly  overall hotel dev kripa ujjain is best hotel for stay 👌 👍
Very good accommodation, near to temple, neatly maintained, good service,near to food street, they provide good guidance to move around ujjain.....

name: Hotel Mittal Paradise
address: Ring Road, near CHL Hospital, Nanakheda, Rishi Nagar, Ujjain, Sawara Khedi, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
Good hotel, but take decision post comparison with others. And go for it if other options are not available. If you are going on a family trip, in the name of a family room they will offer you old rooms from the old wing and not at all good services. But once you are stuck in there and you cannot move out as you will think family members are with you and don't want to trouble them. Rooms are not maintained and the services are not at all attentive.
The surprising part is they have feedback form with reading from best to average, no mention of bad or worst rating. And you can imagine what I would have rated....

I recently stayed at your hotel and had the pleasure of interacting with his at the front desk. From the moment I arrived, he was incredibly welcoming, professional, and helpful.
He went above and beyond to ensure my check-in was smooth, provided great recommendations for local attractions, and promptly assisted with any requests I had. His warm demeanor and attention to detail truly made my stay more enjoyable.

Very Bad Room Service, Ac not cooling properly, No water pressure in washroom, Used towel given, useless shaving kit given. They significantly overcharge for the room and services provided. Only Break Fast was good.

name: Hotel Shrimmaya
address: 62, Kshapnak Marg., FREEGANJ, Madhav Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
1. We take breakfast added booking.
It was a really shameful experience by the restaurant give us.
All things are good, but they are doing bad behave during Free breakfast.
My father request some more food due to less quantity they served, and they refuse to give more and that they tell, "Itna Sa Hi Milega" and we will take charge for extra quantity. This is really bullshit thing I have experienced. So why you provide a option of breakfast added and take more money at the time of booking. Khane ki chijo mai ese kon kerta hai, even maine already paisa de diya tha
2.Room service is good
3. Amenities only lift
4. location from station is very less and on road

Book this hotel only if there is no other options left. Except for the staff nothing was good. Bed sheet, pillow covers and blankets were not in good condition. Even the washroom was also not cleaned properly.

Location is Good and parking is also available.

Hotel is located at good location. Local conveyance available easily.
We have booked two Executive rooms and rooms are spacious and clean.
Breakfast options need to be increased.

Overall comfortable stay at Shrimmaya....
